name: Monochrome Gaia
description:
Imagine living in a world that is full of colour, peace and harmony when one day strange beings arrive, then poof!, everything you grew up to know and love is gone. 

Well, Monochrome Gaia explores that idea. It is set in a black and white world, a world without colour. But it never used to be this way! Colour radiated free once, before The Colour Thief Cult took it all away.

You play as a colourless, shapeless entity navigating this world, finding, collecting and morphing yourself into the three primary shapes, a triangular prism, a sphere and a cube. Each of which contain colours that you will absorb in order to return them to the world. 

Since the arrival of the hunters, it has proven difficult to do so. So you will need to sneak past the hunters and steal your colours back.
